channel.title: hugo on dymc.win
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on dymc.win

item.title: setting up a lean mean hugo blogging theme
item.description: When I first started messing around with hugo, I found the whole thing slihtly mystifying. I downloaded a theme like they asked me, edited the config file to try and customise things a little and quickly broke everything. To be fair, this was mainly due to my tinkering instinct to fly to close to the sun. But anyway, the point at which I started to really appreciate the power of hugo was when I tried to make my own - admittedly less feautureful - theme.
